ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Planes
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh well you don t have to sit in the corner if you don t mind dying. Hate used to be a ton more fun when they had pets and it was actually dangerous, it s way
ygData.messageBody:
Heh well you don't have to sit in the corner if you don't mind dying. Hate
used to be a ton more fun when they had pets and it was actually dangerous,
it's way easier now. It's kind of like fear broken when it gets farmed.

Try a few fear breaks just make sure your groups know what their doing or
you'll lose a good level or 2. Fear breaks are extremly fun though. Some of
my most fun fights are on our second wave in and fighting 3 mobs then 3 more
3 more and then another 3 without a break naked! That's some of the most fun
I've ever had. 12 man fear breaks are also cool but tough.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: ligge@... <ligge@...>
To: EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com <EQ_Necromancer@egroups.com>
Date: Thursday, June 01, 2000 1:58 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Planes


>In a message dated 6/1/00 10:47:08 AM US Mountain Standard Time,
>jackal@... writes:
>
>> Not sure what you mean highpass. You don't try and get exp in plane raids
>> just kill the mob without losing people.
>
>I guess after all the time to get to Planes level I just expected more
>"eewww" - "ahhhhhh" - "wow this is too cool".
>
>One guy on the Druids Grove posted basically "its not for fun, its not for
>exps, its for farming - remember that and you are good to go". I can accept
>that if that is what it is, I guess I just expected more. There is not a
>single item I can think of that in the Planes for me that would make this
>enjoyable. Yes, my best items are there, but I would rather not have the
best
>and just have fun I guess. I can get to 200 wisdom without, I just will
have
>to hurt other stats and I wont be the most efficient druid as far as stats
go
>or have the some of the things I have desired for a long time.
>
>We basically spent 2 hours to get organized and ported, 1 more hour inside
>before first pull. Pulled to a corner for a few hours and supplied members
>with a few nice items. It was just anticlimatic. I feel kind of cheated. Is
>this pull to a corner it? I just don't find that fun. I felt like a bunch
of
>cowards zone fighting without a zone ;-)
>
>I guess the best analogy I can make is its like getting a notice saying YOU
>MADE IT - YOU WON A MIILLION FOR MAKING IT THIS FAR! Then cashing in the
>voucher and finding out it was pesos not dollars.
>
>I am not trying to complain I just felt like it was a huge let down and
>expected to be able to come to work today and tell my bard friend and
>coworker "oh my god we need to get you to 46, it was a blast". I cant do
that.
>
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Accurate impartial advice on everything from laptops to table saws.
>http://click.egroups.com/1/4634/10/_/451101/_/959882306/
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>
>This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
>
>
